questions: Can you provide examples of projects you have worked on that showcase your expertise in .NET, Angular, and Node.js?
How have you stayed updated with the latest developments in software development technologies during your 3 years of experience?
What challenges have you encountered while working on software development projects and how did you overcome them?
How do you approach problem-solving and debugging in your software development work?
Can you discuss a time when you had to collaborate with team members from different departments to successfully deliver a project?
What methodologies and tools do you use for project management and software development processes?
How do you ensure the security and scalability of the software applications you develop?
Have you had experience with integrating third-party APIs or services into your software projects? If so, can you provide examples?
How do you prioritize tasks and manage your time effectively to meet project deadlines?
In what ways do you see yourself continuing to grow and expand your skills in software development in the future?
